    • hotshotmain.py

    # Using the power of Ruby

    task :default => [:main]

    def ext(fn, newext)

    fn.sub(/\.[^.]+$/, newext)

    end

    SRCFILES = Dir OBJFILES = SRCFILES.collect { |fn| ext(fn,“.o”) }

    OBJFILES.each do |objfile|

    srcfile = ext(objfile, ".c")
file objfile => [srcfile] do |t|
  sh "gcc #{srcfile} -c -o #{t.name}"
end

    end

    file “main” => OBJFILES do |t|

    sh "gcc -o #{t.name} main.o a.o b.o"

    end

    task :clean do

    rm_f FileList['*.o']
Dir['*~'].each { |fn| rm_f fn }

    end

    task :clobber => [:clean] do

    rm_f "main"

    end

    task :run => [“main”] do

    sh "./main"

    end

    Validate
